SERVICE-CASHIER.DEPOSIT_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Enter the amount that you wish to deposit.
SERVICE-CASHIER.WITHDRAWAL_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Enter the amount that you wish to withdraw.
SERVICE-CASHIER.DEPOSIT_BONUSCODE_DESCRIPTION: Enter the bonus code that you wish to claim.
SERVICE-CASHIER.ERROR_FORM_VALIDATION: Please review the errors on your input and retry submitting the form.
SERVICE-CASHIER.ERROR_PAYMENT_METHOD_UNAVAILABLE: We're really sorry, this payment method seems to be unavailable at the moment. This problem is temporary, please try again in a few minutes.
SERVICE-CASHIER.ERROR_INCORRECT_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT: We're sorry but the amount deposited is incorrect. Please contact support.
SERVICE-CASHIER.ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: Player does not have sufficient funds.
SERVICE-CASHIER.ERROR_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_UPDATE: We're sorry, we could not update user details, please try again later, or contact customer support
